links.title: Elliott Wave View: Apple (AAPL) Can See Further Downside
links.description: Short Term Elliott Wave View in AAPL suggests the decline from January 04th peak is unfolding as a zig zag Elliott Wave structure. Down from January 04th high, wave ((i)) ended at 174.46. Wave ((ii)) bounce was a strong movement pullback completed at 179.80. Then the stock continued dropping to complete wave ((iii)) at 172.10.

body: $AMD $NASDAQ $TSLA $NVDA $AAPL comparing to 2020 when first Covid infection confirmed with US we can see similar chart now.Same 14% down on Nasdaq and all technicals,hitting 200 MA. In 3/2020 market were on little overbought level,this time we have during November overbought levels.If all good,we can see bottom during this week or next.And then again slow recovery. Realistically we can get on same levels during the May/June as now there wont be any stimulus packages or anything what help economy.Much more again another stupid virus mutation,rising 10yr Bond. Be carefful,but dont keep get fear inside you based on stupid youtubers or bears in here,which only say bullsh1t.

$TSLA  $AAPL $TSLA $AMZN $FB Its Hilarious how when traders starts losing money, they quickly need to blame someone for their losses. joe Biden is not the reason why you're losing money/lost money. It's actually because of YOU. YOU made the mistake and pulled the trigger. Stop blaming others. Blame yourself. It's a very sad reality and its just how human psychology works. Don't be a bull forever, don't be a bear forever. Stop blaming " bears " and stop blaming " bulls ". Just WALK AWAY. THIS GAME IS NOT FOR YOU.
